channel.title: ApocalypsePvP v3 [FINAL RELEASE]
channel.description:
[center] Well, as you can gather from my title, I am quitting private servers. I didn't plan on releasing this source, but under the circumstances that arose, I decided to release it before some leecher does. I initially gave this source to my friend because he wanted it when I quit. He then decided he needed a coder, and I felt that the person he chose was a leecher and a douche bag, so now I am releasing it. P.S. - Considering the fact that I am quitting, all of the pictures will be from my development thread because I cbf to take new ones.
Source: [url=http://uppit.com/g5y5ndcsftxt/Demise_Pking_Source[Quest].rar]http://uppit.com/g5y5ndcsftxt/Demise_Pking_Source[Quest].rar[/url] [code] http://uppit.com/g5y5ndcsftxt/Demise_Pking_Source[Quest].rar [/code] Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?t6rcz7ir4saoy5c]http://www.mediafire.com/?t6rcz7ir4saoy5c[/url]
[ul][li]All gs specs 100% perfect[/li] [li]Perfect Veng with lunar spellbook[/li] [li]Amazing Kills Exchange rewards[/li] [li]Proper Dragon arrows models[/li] [li]Proper Dragon Bolts (e) models[/li] [li]Perfect Dclaw Spec/Anim[/li] [li]New Run Animation[/li] [li]New Walk Animation[/li] [li]New Dance Animation[/li] [li]ALL Skillcape emotes perfect[/li] [li]A custom quest[/li] [li]New donar abilities - Spec restore and Full restore[/li] [li]Lock Exp and Fix Barrows on npc right click[/li] [li]Combat rings (i) for donars[/li] [li]Arcane stream necklace - Donars[/li] [li]Staff of light - Donars[/li] [li]Perfect Sara Sword spec[/li] [li]Perfect Anchor Spec[/li] [li]New bank[/li] [li]Perfect Vls and Stat specials[/li] [li]Items Kept on death interface[/li] [li]Equipment Stats interface[/li] [li]New range/mage prayers work[/li] [li]Much more and more to come![/li] [li]Webclient Added[/li] [list] [li]Working skills added: Thieving Woodcutting Fishing Mining Crafting Firemaking Cooking Smithing[/li] [/list]
New features added! Skilling: All skills were completely removed from this source, so they were completely re-added by me:
Added new dragon claw spec formula - very close to real runescapes:

item.title: ApocalypsePvP v3 [FINAL RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote="[J"]ava link=topic=470357.msg3439861#msg3439861 date=1293016099]
Your Dragon claws formula isn’t correct. Four hits maybe but your hits are out of place[/quote]
You are an idiot… Look at the picture near the bottom. The hits are exactly like Runescapes. 34-17-8-9. 1st hit = whatever you hit. 2nd hit = half the first. 3rd and 4th add up to the second hit. look it up on RuneWiki.

[quote=“demps2k9, post:19, topic:374374”]Uploaded to uppit so you can refresh the page ans say 1k downloads? Lol. That’ the main reason people use uppit.

The server has many bugs. And I will not be downloading. Thanks for releasing it though, maybe some leechers will use.[/quote]
For one, you can’t refresh it for extra downloads anymore. For two, I’m quitting so I don’t give a fuck about amount of downloads. And for three, Mediafire was being gayass so I used uppit.

Read full topic
